alert.note: Alert for Hudson (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued May 15 at 6:36AM EDT until May 15 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Hudson County. In New York, Southern Nassau, Richmond (Staten Island), Kings (Brooklyn) and Southern Queens Counties. * WHEN...This evening. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Similar conditions are likely to occur again with the high tide Monday evening. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. KILL VAN KULL AT BERGEN POINT NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 7.2 FT, MODERATE 8.5 FT, MAJOR 9.6 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.7 FT, MODERATE 3.0 FT, MAJOR 4.1 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 14/07 AM 5.2/ 5.7 -0.3/ 0.2 -0.2/ 0.3 1 NONE 14/08 PM 6.2/ 6.8 0.8/ 1.3 -0.2/ 0.3 1 NONE 15/08 AM 5.5/ 6.0 0.0/ 0.5 0.0/ 0.5 1 NONE 15/09 PM 6.8/ 7.3 1.3/ 1.8 0.2/ 0.7 1 NONE 16/09 AM 5.7/ 6.2 0.2/ 0.7 0.2/ 0.7 1 NONE 16/09 PM 6.9/ 7.4 1.4/ 1.9 0.2/ 0.7 1 NONE NEW YORK HARBOR AT THE BATTERY NY MLLW CATEGORIES -
